name: Dalat, the Land Lost in Time
description: Since 1893, Dr. Yersin dreamt of "le Petit Paris" (the Little Paris) in the Central Highland, the land lost in time. Years flew by and the paths Yersin wandered on his horse have become lovely neighborhoods with unique touches of architectures and arts. The dream has come true, yet the city is still in the forest, fresh and wild as it was born.
